summary: TAKATA RECALL.  THIS RECALL CAME OUT IN JUNE OF 2016, MORE THAN A YEAR AGO.  TO DATE, I STILL HAVE NOT RECEIVED A LETTER FROM FORD SAYING THAT THE REMEDY WAS AVAILABLE.  AND WHEN I CALL A FORD DEALER THEY CONFIRM THAT THE PARTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE TO REMEDY THE RECALL.  IT'S BEEN OVER A YEAR, THE PART SHOULD AVAILABLE TO FIX THIS SUBSTANTIAL SAFETY ISSUE.
